participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys expressing himself through music and cooking.
participant_1.background: I have never been to a fortune teller, but I would like to know if they could tell me why my sister in law dislikes me. My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy. I am in a jazz band and play the saxophone. I wish I could live in a fantasy world. My parents are very supportive of my cooking and baking.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Friendly and creative, loves crafting and making connections with others.
participant_2.background: I cherish my memories with my pets. I really enjoy making friends. My left knee is filled with metal. Anyways I decided to give it a try and participated in an audition for a talent show. I like to sew my own clothing.

content.text: I am sewing some more clothes.
Oh that is cool. I would love to be able to sew my own clothes.
I like to sew my own clothes because I can make what I want and it is less expensive.
What kind of things do you like to sew?
I like to sew clothes for myself and my pets.
That is so cool! I wish I could sew.
You should try it! It is fun and not as hard as it seems.
I might give it a try.
I am glad to hear that.
What is your favorite thing to sew?
I like to sew dresses for myself.
That is so cool. I love dresses.
I also like to sew costumes for my pets.
That is so cool! I have never heard of someone sewing costumes for their pets.
